attributes.additional_details: To help with climate change and protect our world from further damage and also to commit to promises made about climate change and fighting against it.
attributes.background: Stop all developments and drilling in the rosebank oil field for good, Do not plan for anymore projects and continue with the plan for net 0 emissions by 2050.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640606
